column1: #Text=St. Clairsville is a city located in western Belmont County , Ohio .
#Text=The city serves as the county seat .
#Text=US Route 40 runs through the city east and west .
#Text=St. Clairsville can be accessed from the following Interstate 70 exits : 215 , 216 , and 218 .
#Text=There is no public transportation , those traveling the area will need to use their car to get around .
#Text=If you are in downtown , walking may be preferred .
#Text=Built in 1885 the courthouse sits at the highest point in the St. Clairsville Area and is visible from Interstate 70 and parts of the Ohio Valley .
#Text=It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1969 .
#Text=It is a three floor Second Empire building that hosts many county functions such as three courtrooms , the county commission meeting room , as well as various offices for the county officials .
#Text=National Road Bikeway ( Parking is available at both ends : on the south at Township Hwy 278 nr. Wamock St. Clairsville Rd . ( SR 9 ) ; on the north at N. Market St. ( Township Hwy 435 ) ) .
#Text=Runs approximately 2.5 miles / asphalt - approx. 10 ' wide and features a gazebo , two nature trails , and countless scouts projects .
#Text=The Bikeway is the only rail trail in Ohio with a tunnel .
#Text=The Tunnel is 532 feet long and 40 feet high .
#Text=There are water fountains and benches available at the gazebo .
#Text=Additionally there are portable toilets available throughout various points of the trail .
#Text=Adventure Creek Challenge Course , 46426 Crabapple Road , ☏ +1 740-310-7277 , ✉ adventurecreek@gmail.com .
#Text=Offers 14 acres of zip lines and tree trekking .
#Text=Belmont County Sheriff 's Residence Museum , 101 East Main Street , ☏ +1 740-298-7020 , ✉ bcsrmuseum@gmail.com .
#Text=The museum shares with visitors and travelers the history of Belmont County by showcasing the history of the different communities in the area .
#Text=the only bike trail in Ohio passing through a rail tunnel .
#Text=is a Country Music festival near St. Clairsville .
#Text=is one of the largest country music concerts in the Mid-West .
#Text=Jamboree in the Hills , located near St. Clairsville for 30 years , attracts country music fans from all over the United States and Canada .
#Text=Buffalo Creek Primitives , 110 East Main Street , ☏ +1 740-296-5239 , ✉ Buffalocreekprimitives@gmail.com .

#Text=Gift shop which showcases arts and crafts made by artisans .
